allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove auto-defaulting of zero strata to 1

The proportionalAllocation function was still forcing all strata to
have at least 1 sample when totalSize >= number of strata. This
prevented the "Add +1 to zero strata" button from being useful since
strata never showed 0.

Now strata with very small populations will correctly show 0 samples
in the plan, and users can choose to apply coverage overrides.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(dir /b "c:\\Users\\rachura\\OneDrive - Crowe LLP\\VS Code Programming Projects\\CIP CDD Sample Selection")
